attributes.action: Scrap car parking fees for all NHS staff permanently
attributes.additional_details:
NHS staff deserve exceptional status. They are saving people's lives on a daily basis. They should receive better pay and the scrapping of the loan for student nurses. 
They should not be charged for needing to park their vehicle at their place of work.
attributes.background: Permanently remove all car parking fees for all NHS staff.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Make parking for all NHS staff free all of the time.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307909
